title: Hell's Island - aka South Sea Fury (1955 - USA) [DUAL] adventure
description:
Hell's Island (1955 - USA)          aka South Sea Fury          aka The Ruby Virgin

Adventure / Drama / Film-Noir

director . . . . Phil Karlson
starring . . . . John Payne, Mary Murphy, Francis L. Sullivan
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0048160/


Las Vegas bouncer Mike Cormack, a onetime attorney whose career was ruined by alcoholism, is given a proposal by a mysterious man named Barzland. Mike is to visit the tropical island Santo Rosario and retrieve a stolen ruby. The incentive, money, sure, but also revenge. The woman who supposedly took the jewel is Janet, Mike's ex-fiancÃ©e who left him for a pilot. Mike agrees, but quickly finds himself surrounded by danger and deception.
